sb.model.tile.doormechanism

Class ParityGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • sb.model.tile.doormechanism.ButtonDoorGroup
      • sb.model.tile.doormechanism.ParityGroup

  • public class ParityGroup
extends ButtonDoorGroup
    A ButtonDoorGroup whose doors are open if an even number of two or more buttons are pressed.
